instructions: Open Settings . Scroll down and tap General . Tap iPhone Storage .

On Windows, download iTunes for Windows if you don t have it already. Connect your iPhone or iPad to your computer with its charging cable. Open iTunes. Sync your iOS device. Click Check for update . Click Download . Once the download is finished, select Update .
Open Settings . Tap on General . Scroll down to Reset . Select Reset network settings . Enter your passcode and confirm you want to do this.
Launch Settings . Open General . Tap Reset . Select Reset all settings . Confirm with your passcode.
Open Settings . Tap General . Tap Reset . Select Erase All Content and Settings . Confirm with your passcode.
